reviewText:
I loved the original version, but the DVD they sent me is NOT in italian.
Then, be careful because the description is wrong.

Instead, the only available languague is a questionable dub in english.

I have always enjoyed Nino Manfredi,especially in Bread and Chocolate, I missed Cafe Express in the theatres, then moved to NH and was waiting for it to be released someday on DVD, that day came but I was disappointed in the technical quality of the film and the dubbing of Manfredi's voice
